content.rendered: Looking for something for your student to do this summer? Join us for our summer “Bridge” youth programs happening NOW at our 3 metro Atlanta locations (Austell, Marietta, Atlanta).Twice a month, we offer youth programs that focus on life skills, character development, public speaking, job readiness and more! And we provide dinner! To learn more, head over to https://fourcornersgroup.net/our-programs and register today!
